ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextParticipant_.name: Engagement Analysis Text Participant
ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextParticipant_.description: The Engagement Analysis Text Participant DMO represents the participants involved in an engagement session. For example, an agent and a customer are participants in a chat.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is the name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextId__c.description: The identifier of the specific engagement within the session.

ssot__Id__c.description: The identifier of the engagement analysis text participant record.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID for the person that is the participant.

ssot__ParticipantId__c.description: The identifier of the participant in a specific engagement in the session.

ssot__ParticipantObject__c.description: The object for the participant in an engagement analysis text record.

ssot__ParticipantRoleId__c.description: A reference ID for the role of the participant.

ssot__ParticipantRole__c.description: The role of the participant in a specific engagement in the session.
